title: Dragon Age 2 Complete DLC Re-Pack (+ Item Pack 2) -illiria
description:
THE INSTALLER WILL AUTOMATICALLY PATCH YOUR GAME TO VERSION 1.03 AND COPY THE CRACK. ALL DLCS ARE PRE-CRACKED. INSTALLER AUTOMATICALLY DETECTS YOUR GAME FOLDER.

**********************************************************************************


For those of you who just want a pre-cracked Item Pack 2 - download the archive and unpack it into your game folder. Yes, it\'s pre-cracked. No decrypting or editing XML required.


If you want a complete pack with all the DLCs ever released (including Signature Edition items and Legacy) - download the EXE. Size isnt that big (official installer for Legacy alone is bigger!), so I suggest you go with it.


Here is the list of all DLCs included in the pack:

- Black Emporium
- Legacy
- Mage Item Pack
- Mage Item Pack II
- Pre-Order Bonus Items
- Ring of Whispers
- Rogue Item Pack
- Rogue Item Pack II
- Signature Edition Items
- The Antivan Garrote
- The Exiled Prince
- Warrior Item Pack
- Warrior Item Pack II
